languages.text: "Многие месяцы Леди Теодора осаждала {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Адептус Администратум{/g} запросами о предоставлении нового астропатического хора. В конце концов капелла наполнилась новыми голосами. Они не знают, что случилось с предыдущим хором, но... догадываются. И я молюсь Богу-Императору, чтобы они никогда не узнали подробностей той трагедии".

traits.locale_text: "Многие месяцы Леди Теодора осаждала Адептус Администратум запросами о предоставлении нового астропатического хора. В конце концов капелла наполнилась новыми голосами. Они не знают, что случилось с предыдущим хором, но... догадываются. И я молюсь Богу-Императору, чтобы они никогда не узнали подробностей той трагедии".

languages.text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."
languages.original_text: "Многие месяцы Леди Теодора осаждала {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Адептус Администратум{/g} запросами о предоставлении нового астропатического хора. В конце концов капелла наполнилась новыми голосами. Они не знают, что случилось с предыдущим хором, но... догадываются. И я молюсь Богу-Императору, чтобы они никогда не узнали подробностей той трагедии".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the Adeptus Administratum for months with requests to provide her with a new astropathic choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

"Lady Theodora bombarded the Adeptus Administratum for months with requests to provide her with a new astropathic choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

They were never told what happened to the previous choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

"Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

languages.text: «Lady Theodora bombardeó al {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} con solicitudes de un nuevo Coro de Astrópatas durante meses. Al final, llegaron nuevas voces a la capilla. Nunca se les informó de lo que le ocurrió al Coro anterior, pero... se hacen una idea. Y rezo al Dios Emperador para que nunca descubran los detalles de la tragedia».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Theodora bombardeó al Adeptus Administratum con solicitudes de un nuevo Coro de Astrópatas durante meses. Al final, llegaron nuevas voces a la capilla. Nunca se les informó de lo que le ocurrió al Coro anterior, pero... se hacen una idea. Y rezo al Dios Emperador para que nunca descubran los detalles de la tragedia».

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様は、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}帝国行政局{/g}に新しい感応通信聖歌隊を送るよう何カ月も頼んでおられた。最終的に、新しい声が礼拝堂を埋め尽くしたよ。新しい聖歌隊は、前の聖歌隊に何があったのかは聞かされていないが…薄々は感じていたようだ。あの悲劇の詳しいところが彼らの耳に届かないことを神帝陛下に祈るよ」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様は、帝国行政局に新しい感応通信聖歌隊を送るよう何カ月も頼んでおられた。最終的に、新しい声が礼拝堂を埋め尽くしたよ。新しい聖歌隊は、前の聖歌隊に何があったのかは聞かされていないが…薄々は感じていたようだ。あの悲劇の詳しいところが彼らの耳に届かないことを神帝陛下に祈るよ」

languages.text: “在接下来的几个月里，西奥多拉夫人一刻不停地向{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}帝国内政部{/g}提出要求，要求他们为她提供一支新的星语唱诗班。到最后，新的成员到了船上，填补了前任成员留下的空缺。从来没人和他们提起过之前那场灾难，不过……他们预感到了那些人的命运。我向神皇祈祷，希望现在的成员永远不要了解那场悲剧的细节。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

traits.locale_text: “在接下来的几个月里，西奥多拉夫人一刻不停地向帝国内政部提出要求，要求他们为她提供一支新的星语唱诗班。到最后，新的成员到了船上，填补了前任成员留下的空缺。从来没人和他们提起过之前那场灾难，不过……他们预感到了那些人的命运。我向神皇祈祷，希望现在的成员永远不要了解那场悲剧的细节。”

languages.text: "Lady Theodora hat das {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} monatelang mit Anfragen bombardiert, ihr einen neuen astropathischen Chor zur Verfügung zu stellen. Letztlich wurde die Kapelle auch tatsächlich von neuen Stimmen erfüllt. Ihnen wurde nie gesagt, was mit dem früheren Chor geschehen ist, doch ... sie ahnen es. Und ich bete zum Gottimperator, dass sie die Einzelheiten dieser Tragödie niemals erfahren werden."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora hat das Adeptus Administratum monatelang mit Anfragen bombardiert, ihr einen neuen astropathischen Chor zur Verfügung zu stellen. Letztlich wurde die Kapelle auch tatsächlich von neuen Stimmen erfüllt. Ihnen wurde nie gesagt, was mit dem früheren Chor geschehen ist, doch ... sie ahnen es. Und ich bete zum Gottimperator, dass sie die Einzelheiten dieser Tragödie niemals erfahren werden."

languages.text: « Pendant des mois, dame Théodora a bombardé l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} de requêtes pour qu'on lui adjoigne un nouveau chœur astropathique et à la longue, elle a fini par obtenir gain de cause. Les remplaçants n'ont pas été informés du triste sort de leurs prédécesseurs, mais... ils en ont une vague idée. Et je prie l'Empereur-Dieu pour qu'ils n'apprennent jamais les détails de cette tragédie. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant des mois, dame Théodora a bombardé l'Adeptus Administratum de requêtes pour qu'on lui adjoigne un nouveau chœur astropathique et à la longue, elle a fini par obtenir gain de cause. Et je prie l'Empereur-Dieu pour qu'ils n'apprennent jamais les détails de cette tragédie. »

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora, kendisine yeni bir Astropatik Koro sağlamaları talebiyle {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}'u aylar boyunca sıkıştırdı. En nihayetinde şapeli yeni sesler doldurdu. Önceki Koro'nun akıbeti kendileriyle paylaşılmasa da... Bir şeyler seziyorlar. Ben de Tanrı İmparator'a yaşanan trajedinin ayrıntılarını asla öğrenmemeleri için dua ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora bombarded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g} for months with requests to provide her with a new Astropathic Choir. In the end, new voices did fill the chapel. They were never told what happened to the previous Choir, but... they have inklings. And I pray to the God-Emperor that they never find out the details of that tragedy."
